SimpleConversation.name: Jack
SimpleConversation.message: Hello Jill how are doing today?

SimpleConversation.name: Jack
SimpleConversation.message: Me too! Want to go climb up that steep hill?

SimpleConversation.name: Jill
SimpleConversation.message: Maybe later, I'm a little tired.

SimpleConversation.name: Jack
SimpleConversation.message: Oh, okay. I'll see you later then.

ConversationWithQuestionsGreat.name: Jack

ConversationWithQuestionsTerrible.name: Jack
ConversationWithQuestionsTerrible.message: Nothing is going right for me today.
